title: âˆž The Dalrymple Report: Apple TV, iPhone and Find My
description: Dave and I explore another Apple TV bug and share another one from a listener. We also recap what we know about Apple's upcoming event on Monday, and Dave shows us how to find our Apple TV remote using an app on our iPhone. Follow this podcast Show Notes: Apple Event Goodbye to AnandTech Mark Gurman on the coming M4 Pro Mac mini Did you know you can use your iPhone to find your Apple TV remote? The Bands and the Fans Were Fake. The $10 Million Was Real Shows and movies we're watching Without Sin, Acorn TV What to do When Someone Dies, Acorn TV
author: Jim Dalrymple
excerpt: BBEdit 14, the power tool for text, adds Notes, vastly extended language support & more.
text: BBEdit 14, the power tool for text, adds Notes, vastly extended language support & more.
